/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees on both sides, curves gently to the right, disappearing into the distance. A car is seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with the green of the trees contrasting against the gray of the road and the overcast sky.
